name: Belt of the Twilight Assassin
rules: 1, Discard an equipment -> Add a murder counter. Your hero has Assault 1 for each murder counter.

name: Bladebreaker Gauntlets
rules: When this armor enters play, you may destroy target armor or weapon. Opposing weapons have -1 ATK. Opposing armor have -1 DEF

name: Leggings of the Tireless Sentry
rules: Opposing heroes and allies enter play exhausted. At the end of each opponent's turn, exhaust all heroes and allies he controls.

name: Wraps of the Astral Traveler
rules: On your turn: 3, [Exhaust] -> Remove target opposing ability, ally, or equipment from the game. Its owner puts it into play at the start of your next turn.
